content:
This site was put together to host some non-English translations of a Community Pages published in PLoS Biology: XXXXXXX.
Currently, the piece has been translated into the following languages:
Spanish Portugese Russian Traditional Chinese Swahili Italian Contribute If you see a language not on this list but would like to contribute, please email Corey Callaghan (callaghan.corey.t@gmail.com), or create a pull request.
Last updated: Sept 2022
title: About This Site
